If Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease is suspected, use ED Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD) Powerplan

AVOID nitroglycerin if any of the following are present:  - SBP below 90 mmHg or if more than 30 mmHg drop from baseline  - Suspected right ventricular infarction  - Recent use of phosphodiesterase inhibitors: within 24 hours for sildenafil [VIAGRA] and vardenafil [LEVITRA] and within 48 hours for tadalafil [CIALIS]
